snippet: Deciding on a time and place to retire is especially hard for couples, who may not be on the same schedule. Experts advise patience and compromise.
abstract: Older couples face challenges in deciding where and when to retire, as new schedules need to be agreed upon, compromises reached and adjustments made to new lifestyle that both can agree on; experts advise patience and for each person to be willing to delve emotionally to resolve difficult decisions.
lead_paragraph: Deciding on a time and place to retire is especially hard for couples, who may not be on the same schedule. Experts advise patience and compromise.

headline.main: For Older Couples, House-Hunting Begins With Soul-Searching
headline.print_headline: For Older Couples, House-Hunting Begins With Soul-Searching
